CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name = 'ISU Foundation Governors', Volunteer_Job__r.Name + ' ' + CASE(Status__c, 'Emeritus', 'Emeritus', 'Active'), IF( RecordType.Name = 'ISU Foundation Board of Directors', Volunteer_Job__r.Name, Volunteer_Shift__r.Name + ' - ' + Volunteer_Job__r.Name))
CustomField.label: Governance Campaign and Committee
